Room.Name: Cellar Hall
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a hallway under Natasha's mausoleum. It connects to a cellar.
Room.LongDescription: No one has been here in a long time, as you can see by the dust and cobwebs. Under the dust there is a heap of old bones, and if you are not careful, your own may be there also. There is an animal-like smell coming from the cellar, and its not very plesant.
